00096       typedef std::pair<type, vec*> pair;
00098       struct paircmp
00099       {
00100         bool
00101         operator () (const pair& p1, const pair& p2) const
00102         {
00103           if (p1.first != p2.first)
00104             return p1.first < p2.first;
00105           return *p1.second < *p2.second;
00106         }
00107       };
00108       typedef std::map<pair, formula*, paircmp> map;
00109       static map instances;
